text.p: These are the leading stories in the Moroccan press on Saturday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- King Hassan inaugurates the new building of Moroccan foreign ministry.
- World forum on water is expected to be held in the southern city of Marrakesh on March 20.
- Morocco needs more foreign investments to upgrade it economy and join other emerging countries.
- U.S. General Electric firm sign a $3 million joint-venture deal with local firm.
- French Accor group interested in investing in Moroccan tourism sector.
- Foreign observers praised Morocco's efforts to eradicate drug smuggling.
- Social dialogue continues between government officials and unions.
- Moroccan women should be more involved in poltics in future.
